data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,596 believers in the state of Yap to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yap, Micronesia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Yap.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Yap that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Yap, Micronesia.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Japanese people.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Yap, Micronesia. Please, stir the 2,596 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, we pray that the people of Yap, Micronesia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Yap, Micronesia has a population of 11,400.

We estimate Yap has 2,596 people who might know Jesus, 8,282 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 522 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Yap do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Yap
location.cities_list: Colonia, Ifalik Village, Satawal Village, Fais, Satawal
location.cities_list_w_pop: Colonia (7,371), Ifalik Village (561), Satawal Village (531), Fais (215), Satawal
